description:
Zerobank envisages itself as a legal ecosystem utilizing blockchain and smart contracts to enable the following: Zerobank envisages itself as a legal ecosystem utilizing blockchain and smart contracts to enable the following:
  • Multi-currency wallet and P2P OTC trading and exchange
  • P2P International Money Transfer
  • Multi-currency E-Wallet for international tourists
  • Charitable donations
name: Zerobank
